meanings.sent1: She tried to ameliorate the situation by apologizing.
meanings.sent2: The new medicine helped ameliorate his pain.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to ameliorate the burnt dinner with extra seasoning failed.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words acted as a balm to ameliorate his wounded pride.
meanings.sent5: The rain helped ameliorate the drought-stricken land.
